items.content_html: Review Request Bot is a lightweight Node.js service that listens to GitLab merge request comment events and sends notifications to Slack. It supports both targeted reviewer notifications (/ping <team>) and channel-wide alerts (/ping-all <team>), ensuring your team never misses a review request.
items.title: DenisovAndrey/review-request-bot: Review Request Bot is a lightweight Node.js service that listens to GitLab merge request comment events and sends notifications to Slack. It supports both targeted reviewer notifications (/ping <team>) and channel-wide alerts (/ping-all <team>), ensuring your team never misses a review request.
